Uses of Interface
maze.Room

  • Packages that use Room 
    Package Description
    maze  

    • Uses of Room in maze

      Methods in maze that return Room 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      Room MazeBuilder.createExit​(java.lang.String longDescription, java.lang.String shortDescription)
      Creates a Room with the specified descriptions.
      Room MazeBuilder.createRoom​(java.lang.String longDescription, java.lang.String shortDescription)
      Creates a Room with the specified descriptions.
      Room Maze.getStart()
      Returns the starting Room of this Maze.
      Methods in maze that return types with arguments of type Room 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      ListInterface<Room> Room.getRooms()
      Returns a ListInterface of the Rooms which can be reached from this Room.
      ListInterface<Room> MazeSolution.getSolution()
      Returns a ListInterface containing Rooms in an order which can be used to reach an exit.
      Methods in maze with parameters of type Room 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      MazeBuilder MazeBuilder.addOneWayPassage​(Room fromRoom, Room toRoom)
      Creates a passage from fromRoom to toRoom such that toRoom is added to the ListInterface returned by fromRoom's getRooms() method.
      MazeBuilder MazeBuilder.addPassage​(Room room0, Room room1)
      Creates a passage between room0 and room1 such that room1 is added to the ListInterface returned by room0's getRooms() method and room0 is added to the ListInterface returned by room1's getRooms() method.
      Constructors in maze with parameters of type Room 
      Constructor Description
      Maze​(Room start)
      Creates a Maze specifying the starting Room.
